title: little packets
extract: A packet is a small container in which a quantity of something is sold. Packets are either small boxes made of thin cardboard, or bags or envelopes made of paper or plastic. ... You can refer to a lot of money as a packet.
extract_html: A packet is a small container in which a quantity of something is sold. Packets are either small boxes made of thin cardboard, or bags or envelopes made of paper or plastic. ... You can refer to a lot of money as a packet.
